titleStmt.title: Elegy occasioned by the death of the Reverend Mr. Samuel Smith late ordinary of Newgate, who departed this life on the 28th day of August 1698, aged 72 years.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and sold by J. Read ...,

notesStmt.note: Within mourning border, with emblems and motto at head.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
